name: Not Gate
title: Not Gate
description: Inverts the input of the gate.

name: CNot Gate
title: CNot Gate
description: Inverts the input of the gate when the control is activated.

name: Swap Gate
title: Swap Gate
description: Swaps the two inputs of the gate.

name: CSwap Gate
title: CSwap Gate
description: Swaps the two inputs of the gate when the control is activated.

name: CCSwap Gate
title: CCSwap Gate
description: Swaps the two inputs of the gate when the controls are activated.

name: Pipe Gate
title: Pipe Gate
description: Moves the input down one block.

name: Pete Gate
title: Pete Gate
description: Hadamard gate. Outputs either random ball or misty clouds.

name: Black Gate
title: Black Ball
description: Black ball which represents 1.

name: White Gate
title: White Ball
description: White ball which represents 0.

name: WB Mist
title: White/Back Mist
description: Constructive Misty State.

name: WNB Mist
title: White/-Back Mist
description: Destructive Misty State.

name: Tutorials
title: Tutorials
description: Watch tutorials on how the canvas works and learn more about quantum computing.

name: Go Back
title: Undo
description: Undoes the last step.

name: Run
title: Run
description: Runs the next step.

name: Forward
title: Run All
description: Runs all steps.

name: Remove Output
title: Clear Output
description: Removes the balls and mists that were created during runtime.

name: Remove All Balls
title: Clear All Balls
description: Removes all balls and mists on the canvas.

name: Clear Canvas
title: Clear Canvas
description: Clears the canvas of all balls, mists, and gates.

name: Hide output
title: Hide output
description: Hides the generated output behind a blue square.

name: Tool-Tips
description: Hover over a gate for more information.
